text: The Journal of Levantine Studies is a biannual peer-reviewed academic journal on Levantine geography, society and culture. It aims to reclaim the notion of the Levant as a historical and political concept and as a category of identity and classification. The journal is published by the Van Leer Jerusalem Institute. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Middle Eastern studies journals Category:Publications established in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Israel Category:Biannual journals Category:Levant Category:English-language journals
title: Journal of Levantine Studies
